resources.string: Privacy dashboard helps you control and better protect your privacy
Tap to enable quick privacy protection
Personal data leakage over past 24 hours.
Currently there are %1$d trackers in your apps, %2$d trackers are active
"%1$d apps are using location permission\nCurrent location mode: "
Quick protection enables these settings when turned on
- All trackers are turned off.\n- Your geolocation will be faked.\n- Your real IP address will be hidden.
Choose if you want to fake your real location when app asks for your geolocation tracking.
Choose if you want to expose your real IP address or hide when connected to the internet (uses the tor network).
I can be tracked by my IP address
I am anonymous on the internet
I am exposing my real IP address
Manage and control apps requesting various permissions.
